attributes.title: Venison stalker pie
attributes.description: As comforting as a classic shepherd’s pie – but starring our wild British park venison, rather than lamb – this warming dish is perfect for chilly nights. A creamy potato and parsnip topping is grilled until golden.

attributes.title: Mexican bean stuffed sweet potato with guacamole
attributes.description: Our healthy, Mexican-inspired spin on jacket potatoes. Oven-roasted sweet potato halves are smothered with a combo of simmered black beans, sweetcorn and baby plum tomatoes, then topped with a creamy, limey guacamole.

attributes.title: Middle Eastern aubergine, lamb and pomegranate
attributes.description: Roasted until gooey, aubergine is an ideal partner for our pan-fried, pasture-grazed lamb, fragranced with garlic, cinnamon, smoked paprika and cumin. We drizzle over a cooling yoghurt sauce and sprinkle with juicy pomegranate seeds.

attributes.title: Pesto chicken with butternut & tomato bake
attributes.description: An easy traybake full of flavour. We coat free-range British chicken breasts in fragrant basil pesto, then roast over onion-sweetened tomato sauce with broccoli and pumpkin seeds. Chunks of butternut squash add vitamin A.

attributes.title: Rich lentil bolognese with courgetti
attributes.description: Fragrant thyme, sweet sundried tomato, earthy mushroom – our plant-based bolognese stars classic Italian flavours, but uses mineral-rich lentils rather than beef. We replace pasta with lighter courgetti, too, and sneak in crunch with pine nuts. This recipe has been approved by British Heart Foundation dietitians, helping to support heart and circulatory health.

attributes.title: Seared beef with spring vegetable medley
attributes.description: We've paired a succulent seared steak with a medley of spring vegetables including sweet baby carrots, crisp sugar snap peas and bright red radishes.

attributes.title: Thai red fish skewers & grilled pak choi
attributes.description: Juicy, sustainably sourced cod, smothered in red curry paste – these skewers, griddled until golden, will transport you to the tropics. We pair them with potato salad, lifted with ginger and onion, and smoky pak choi.

attributes.title: Sockeye salmon with honey & mustard quinoa salad
attributes.description: Sockeye salmon with honey & mustard quinoa salad

attributes.title: Spanish chicken bake & griddled courgette
attributes.description: This Spanish chicken dish is packed full of delicious Mediterranean flavours, perfect for a healthy, mid week meal.

attributes.title: Classic beef burger with sweet potato fries
attributes.description: Family Favourite. Even the pickiest little eaters love burgers – especially when they’re made from our grass-fed British beef and paired with fries and salad. We serve 'em as you should, with sliced tomatoes and pickled onions.

attributes.title: Za’atar cod, pomegranate tabbouleh & harissa dip
attributes.description: Our sustainably caught cod is coated in Middle Eastern spice blend za'atar, and lightly fried, alongside a pomegranate studded quinoa tabbouleh.

attributes.title: Salmon, beet sauerkraut & mustard potatoes
attributes.description: Sustainably sourced salmon, topped with a herby almond crust – just the thing for a light and healthy dinner. We serve with potatoes coated in wholegrain mustard, and moreish sauerkraut made with crunchy caraway seeds and folate-rich beetroot.

attributes.title: Creamy turkey & sundried tomato pesto casserole
attributes.description: Free-range British turkey coated in velvety coconut yoghurt and fragrant red pesto is served over a filling bed of brown rice, studded with vitamin K-source spinach. An easy and comforting midweek meal.

attributes.title: Cod with spicy butter beans & lemon yoghurt
attributes.description: Our sustainably sourced cod is so deliciously flaky, it doesn’t need dressing up – here we bake it simply with just lemon, salt and pepper. It’s paired with paprika-spiced butter beans, stewed with passata, and vitamin-rich Tenderstem broccoli.

attributes.title: Brazilian black bean stew & brown rice
attributes.description: Our version of feijoada – Brazil’s national dish – stews fibre-packing black beans with sweet pepper, earthy spices and rich raw cacao. We drizzle with creamed coconut, then spoon over brown rice.

attributes.title: Southern bun-less burger & cheezy carrot chips
attributes.description: Louisiana-spiced, grass-fed British beef burgers, topped with fried eggs – so delicious they don't even need buns. We pair them with mixed salad, herby dip and crisp carrot chips, sprinkled with addictive cashew ‘parmesan’.

attributes.title: Harissa roasted aubergine with garlic & chilli chicken
attributes.description: British free-range chicken thighs are smothered in garlic, harissa and chilli, then baked until juicy. You’ll love them served over gooey spiced aubergine, and paired with pesto potatoes, fresh cucumber and coriander.

attributes.title: Cod with Italian-style tomato risotto
attributes.description: It’s our easy, healthy take on risotto – with brown rice, sweet sundried tomatoes and fragrant Italian herbs. We pack in greens with courgette and spinach, then top with a flaky baked fillet of sustainably sourced cod.

attributes.title: Harissa salmon, mango salsa & black rice
attributes.description: This dish is all about contrasts – succulent, sustainably sourced salmon with punchy harissa; sweet mango with zingy lime. With black rice and tenderstem broccoli served on the side, it’s fresh, colourful and packed with nutrients, too.

attributes.title: Cod with celeriac chips & minted peas
attributes.description: Our fresh cod is coated in a ground almond, lemon and herb crumb then served with homemade celeriac chips, minted mushy peas and roasted tomatoes.

attributes.title: Turkish chicken, black rice & Choban salad
attributes.description: Marinating free-range chicken breasts in yogurt and warming spices locks in tenderness and flavour. Served with nutty black rice and a crunchy, chopped Shepherd’s (Choban) salad.

attributes.title: Mushroom & lentil pie with crispy potatoes
attributes.description: Kids will love this rich veggie bake, loaded with chestnut mushrooms, nutty lentils, fragrant thyme and dried porcini mushrooms. We top it with delicious layers of potato and a 'cheesy' crumb.

attributes.title: Black olive chicken, garlic butter bean mash
attributes.description: Spanish cuisine uses bold amounts of smoked paprika and lots of punchy black olives. We take inspiration from them for this tender chicken dish, served with creamy garlic butter bean mash and roasted green beans.

attributes.title: Haddock, Asian veg & coconut black rice
attributes.description: Coconut black rice infused with ginger, garlic and chilli contrasts with delicate white haddock and a selection of crisp Asian vegetables. As always, our fish is responsibly sourced. The perfect meal for date night?

attributes.title: Ginger chicken with buckwheat noodles & peanuts
attributes.description: A quick stir-fry for when you want food fast – featuring free-range chicken, tender broccoli and nutty buckwheat noodles, and fragranced with ginger and garlic. We finish with a sprinkling of crunchy peanut and zingy lime.

attributes.title: Roasted squash, black chickpeas & green tahini
attributes.description: This warm roasted ‘salad’ is filling, flavourful and packed with nutrients. Squash, red onion and kale meet vibrant black chickpeas, sprinkled with dukkah. We finish with herby tahini sauce and a scattering of pistachios.

attributes.title: Tofu tikka masala, tenderstem & brown rice
attributes.description: Tender tofu chunks are coated in rich tikka masala curry, warmed with garlic and ginger and studded with sweet baby plum tomatoes. To finish, we add nutritious brown rice and broccoli, and brighten with zesty lime.

attributes.title: Cajun chicken, salsa & purple sweet potato
attributes.description: We've served spicy cajun chicken alongside purple sweet potato mash, with a zingy salsa & creamy turmeric & coconut dressing.

attributes.title: Fragrant coconut tofu curry & red rice
attributes.description: A fragrant tofu & coconut curry, infused with ginger, garlic and cardamom.

attributes.title: Minced steak chilli & zingy avocado salsa
attributes.description: We use only the very best beef in our chilli – always British and grass-fed – so it packs big flavour. A dollop of avocado salsa adds crucial vitamin E, protective against the effects of free radicals.

attributes.title: Hasselback courgette tomato bake with pork ribeye
attributes.description: Hasselback isn’t just for potatoes! This version, featuring courgettes rubbed with fragrant basil pesto, is simple and looks impressive. It’s the perfect side to our free-range British pork steaks, seared ‘til golden and juicy.

attributes.title: Mexican-style steak, avocado salsa & brown rice
attributes.description: Our grass-fed British flat iron steaks, dressed up for a fiesta! We sear them ‘til caramelised, and serve over a bed of brown rice, brightened by red onion and spinach. On the side? Cooling avocado salsa.

attributes.title: Persian aubergine lentils, pomegranate & mint rice
attributes.description: We take inspiration from Iranian cuisine and its cornerstone ingredients for this delicate lentil dish, featuring warm cinnamon, mint-laced yoghurt, soft aubergine and tart pomegranate. A colourful, hearty dinner.

attributes.title: Spiced tofu tagine with apricots & quinoa
attributes.description: Our vegan take on the classic tagine; we swap the meat for tofu and couscous for quinoa. Fragrant harissa infuses the dish with a rich, earthy flavour which contrasts well with sweet dried apricots.

attributes.title: Sweet miso tofu & aubergine skewers
attributes.description: We love white miso for its gut-boosting goodness and savoury-sweet flavour –and it adds perfect flair to these smoky grilled tofu and aubergine skewers. A zippy vinegar pickle, laced with mineral-rich seaweed, lends refreshing contrast.

attributes.title: Madeleine Shaw's Harissa chicken kebabs
attributes.description: Free-range chicken infused with harissa, coconut, garlic and maple syrup, which give the skewers a lovely glaze once cooked. Accompanied by a herby pomegranate cauliflower rice.

attributes.title: Peanut chicken, zesty slaw & cauliflower rice
attributes.description: Red cabbage, vibrant carrot, garden-fresh spring onion – this rainbow of a salad is light and fresh for summer nights. It’s satisfying, too: featuring shredded free-range chicken, vitamin C-rich cauliflower rice and a sticky peanut dressing.

attributes.title: Chicken & quinoa Greek salad bowl with tzatziki
attributes.description: Bring Santorini-style sunshine to your dinner table with our take on a Greek salad: starring tender free-range chicken, British quinoa and plump black olives. We finish with generous dollops of cooling coconut tzatziki.

attributes.title: Olive tapenade & sundried tomato chicken
attributes.description: Fancy a trip to the south of France? This dish feels like one: savoury olive tapenade joins our juicy, sun-dried tomato chicken, garlic-dressed green beans and a delicious potato mash.

attributes.title: Red pesto steak & Italian-style potato salad
attributes.description: Sometimes only a steak will do. Our Yorkshire heritage flat iron – grass-fed and dry-aged – is dressed in red pesto and devoured with a nutritious potato salad, stuffed with olives, green beans and sweet cherry tomatoes.

attributes.title: Madeleine Shaw's Spicy chickpea taco bowl
attributes.description: In this dish, surprisingly versatile chickpeas are prepared with a tropical twist. Pan-fried until golden with warming spices, they make the perfect foil for a lime, cucumber and mango salsa, and velvety avocado.

attributes.title: Barbecue-style chicken, sweetcorn rice & slaw
attributes.description: These tender chicken strips are glazed in a smoky, sticky barbecue sauce that's quick to make at home. Served with sweetcorn-studded brown rice and crunchy cabbage slaw.

attributes.title: Coconut lemongrass tofu & noodle soup
attributes.description: This nourishing broth has tropical flavours galore – zingy lemongrass, silky coconut, warming ginger and fiery chilli. We boost protein with tofu, add buckwheat noodles for essential vitamins, and sprinkle over chopped coriander for brightness.

attributes.title: Salmon, roasted veg & lemon tahini dressing
attributes.description: Cumin-scented beetroot and garden-fresh courgettes with crispy kale make a colourful bed for our sustainably sourced salmon, baked simply with garlic and lemon. To finish: a totally moreish, fibre-rich tahini drizzle.

attributes.title: Verbena harissa tofu & turmeric rice
attributes.description: Citrussy, green and mildly spiced, we’re addicted to Belazu’s punchy verbena harissa. Here we toss it with tofu and coconut yoghurt to create an innovative curry, and serve over golden turmeric and cumin rice.

attributes.title: Sweet & sour pork loin with lightly fried rice
attributes.description: A Mindful Chef spin on sweet and sour, with flavourful free-range British pork, lightly fried brown rice and oodles of veg! A rainbow of red peppers, carrots, sweetcorn and spring onions delivers essential vitamins.

attributes.title: Tomato & butter bean bake with verbena yoghurt
attributes.description: Zesty verbena pesto adds a sunshine lift to our fibre-rich butter bean bake, enriched with sundried tomato, black olives and smoky paprika. Slices of golden roast fennel add to the Mediterranean vibe.

attributes.title: Katsu turkey curry with brown rice & tenderstem
attributes.description: This Japanese crowd-pleaser will even get fussy eaters excited. Honey and tamari-glazed turkey is coated in toasted sesame seeds, then smothered in a silky, mild curry sauce. Brown rice soaks up flavour; tenderstem brings green.

attributes.title: Beetroot quinoa risotto & parsnip crisps
attributes.description: We've stirred beetroot through our quinoa risotto for a sweet earthy flavour.

attributes.title: Salmon with patatas bravas & padron peppers
attributes.description: There is nothing like smoky patatas bravas: golden cubes of potato roasted with paprika. Added to a garlicky tomato sauce with black olives, they’re the perfect side for a tender piece of salmon. Served with roasted padron peppers.

attributes.title: Smoked salmon cakes with dill & coriander yogurt
attributes.description: This sustainably sourced salmon dish stars Scandi-style flavours: think fragrant dill, zingy lemon and cooling cucumber. Silky coconut yoghurt dip, brightened with coriander, and crisp salad make these fishcakes perfect for summer.

attributes.title: Spicy Mexican chicken, coconut and lime rice
attributes.description: Tender, free-range Norfolk chicken breasts seasoned with our Mexican spice mix. Butterflied then grilled, they're served up with indulgent coconut rice, sweetcorn, fresh herbs and a squeeze of lime.

attributes.title: Spicy chipotle chickpeas & red cabbage slaw
attributes.description: Hearty, filling chickpeas sizzle with smoky chipotle and smooth passata – providing a perfect contrast to a crisp and creamy red cabbage slaw, drenched with coconut yoghurt, lime and coriander. A satisfying weeknight dinner.

attributes.title: Venison casserole with sautéed cabbage
attributes.description: Our lean British wild venison has a rich flavour, perfect for this warming casserole – stuffed with hearty root veg including carrots, parsnips and potatoes. We serve it with pan-fried cabbage and a dollop of mustard.

attributes.title: Cashew tofu 'korma', roast aubergine & cauli rice
attributes.description: Our vegan korma is deliciously decadent, enriched with cashew butter and coconut milk, and stuffed with cubes of golden tofu and oven-roasted aubergine. A coriander and cauliflower rice soaks up all that luscious curry sauce.

attributes.title: Moroccan fish & spinach tagine
attributes.description: This quick take on the Moroccan classic uses sustainably sourced coley, hearty aubergine, sweet pepper and a cheeky shortcut – our flavourful tagine paste! Just before serving we stir through spinach and scatter with toasted almonds.

attributes.title: Roasted pepper lentils & olives with tenderstem
attributes.description: This vitamin-packed salad sings of the French countryside – filling Beluga lentils are tossed in a sundried tomato and olive sauce, brightened by yellow peppers. Avocado adds creaminess; Tenderstem and rocket are your essential greens.

attributes.title: Asian steak skewers with cauliflower rice
attributes.description: These succulent skewers are accompanied by a fragrant cauliflower rice, the perfect light dinner full of flavour.

attributes.title: Sunflower 'mince' chilli, kidney beans & guac
attributes.description: It’s all the comfort of chilli con carne, minus the meat. Our nutty sunflower ‘mince’ is just as satisfying, and simmers gorgeously with fibre-source kidney beans, chilli flakes and cumin. Mashed avocado tempers the heat.

attributes.title: Pork meatball, kale & bean casserole
attributes.description: A cosy casserole for chilly days. Juicy free-range British pork meatballs, fragranced with rosemary and parsley, bubble away with sundried tomatoes, butter beans and vitamin K powerhouse kale.

attributes.title: Korean-style steak, pickled carrot & sesame rice
attributes.description: Now that’s what we call K-pop! Vitamin K-rich broccoli meets sweet pickled carrot shavings and warm sesame sauce in our take on bibimbap. Grass-fed British rump steak is drenched in a sweet-sour chilli dressing.

attributes.title: Tandoori salmon with mixed vegetables
attributes.description: Our Mindful Chef take on tandoori uses succulent, sustainably sourced salmon – coated in creamy coconut, warm cumin and zesty lemon, then roasted until flaky. We serve it up with fibre-packing courgettes and crunchy red pepper.

attributes.title: Shawarma steak, quinoa tabbouleh & tahini
attributes.description: Street food fans will love our ‘mindful’ twist on shawarma. No guilt here: just warm house-blended spices, grass-fed British beef and a fresh, herby quinoa tabbouleh. We finish with lashings of fibre-rich tahini dressing.

attributes.title: Teriyaki chicken with tenderstem
attributes.description: Sweet, vitamin A-rich carrots make a flavourful mash, the perfect base for tender free-range British chicken thighs, glazed in sticky teriyaki sauce. tenderstem broccoli brings body-boosting vitamins; chilli and lime add heat and zing.

attributes.title: Harissa chicken, avocado, squash & mint
attributes.description: Harissa and smoked paprika impart a Tunisian-inspired warmth to these pan-fried Cumbrian chicken breasts, which we serve with creamy avocado, sweet roasted squash and chopped mint.

attributes.title: Haddock with ratatouille & black olive tapenade
attributes.description: This light and healthy meal is a take on French ratatouille. We cook a Mediterranean veggie stew, then serve with a portion of delicately cooked, seasonal fresh haddock topped with a salty olive tapenade.

attributes.title: Middle Eastern lamb in lettuce wraps
attributes.description: Warm cinnamon, earthy cumin, smoky paprika – we sizzle our tender lamb mince with a medley of comforting spices. Crisp baby gem lettuce leaves make for refreshing contrast; a nutty tahini drizzle is the final touch.

attributes.title: Starter-Roasted miso aubergine with spring onions
attributes.description: Melt in the mouth aubergine roasted with a generous layer of tangy sweet miso paste, blended with rice wine vinegar, sesame oil and fresh ginger. Sprinkled with crisp spring onions.

attributes.title: Sticky harissa chicken with mango salsa
attributes.description: Light, fresh but with major taste: our sweet and spicy salad tosses juicy mango salsa with honey-harissa free-range chicken. We serve all on a bed of healthy greens, including crunchy cucumber, rocket and Tenderstem broccoli.

attributes.title: Shawarma pigeon with lentils and rainbow chard
attributes.description: A dinner party-worthy dish with Middle Eastern flair. Tender pigeon, marinated in sticky pomegranate molasses and punchy shawarma spice, is seared then served over garlicky lentils. Wilted rainbow chard packs essential vitamins.

attributes.title: Sesame tofu, mango & spicy ginger dressing
attributes.description: It’s a rainbow in a bowl – tropical mango, garden-fresh mangetout, spicy chilli and crunchy black sesame seeds. And it’s delicious as it looks: limey ginger dressing coats tofu, pan-fried until golden and crisp.

attributes.title: Chocolate avocado mousse
attributes.description: You won’t believe this creamy, velvety pud until you’ve tried it. Avocado whips up into an indulgent mousse when mixed with coconut milk, rich cocoa powder and maple syrup. Garnished with freeze-dried raspberries and toasted coconut chips.

attributes.title: Chai spiced black rice pudding with mango
attributes.description: We use black rice and coconut milk to make a luxurious pudding spiked with cardamom and ginger. It creates a beautiful contrast with fresh, vivid mango cubes and coconut shavings.

attributes.title: Roasted miso aubergine, edamame rice & cashews
attributes.description: A moreish marinade of umami-rich miso and zingy ginger elevates humble aubergine in this Japanese-inspired plate. Paired with edamame rice, toasted cashew nuts and a sprinkle of chilli, it’s so delicious you’ll be craving seconds.

attributes.title: Pesto salmon, tomato & roasted vegetable penne
attributes.description: Even kids who are fussy will enjoy this sustainably sourced salmon, coated in a herby basil pesto, served atop filling penne. We pack veg into the sauce: roasted red peppers and onion.

attributes.title: Tamarind chicken & yellow pepper kebabs
attributes.description: Juicy chicken & yellow kebabs with a sweet & sour tamarind marinade and sautéed bok choy, served with red rice.

attributes.title: Crepes with caramelised oranges & chocolate sauce
attributes.description: These crêpes are made with gluten-free buckwheat flour, just like the ones from Brittany. We top them with caramelised orange segments and crunchy hazelnuts, then drizzle them with a luscious chocolate-maple sauce.

attributes.title: Asian-style sweet chilli beef noodles
attributes.description: We add freshness to brown rice noodles by tossing through ribbons of vitamin-packed carrots, and pizzazz by sprinkling over chopped herbs, sesame seeds and punchy tamari dressing. The highlight, though? Slivers of seared grass-fed British steak.

attributes.title: Seared steak with cucumber & buckwheat tabbouleh
attributes.description: We dust our grass-fed British beef steaks in earthy ras el hanout spice mix, then sear with garlic in this Middle Eastern-inspired meal. Fluffy tabbouleh, made with mineral-rich buckwheat, joins on the side.

attributes.title: Spiced jackfruit lettuce boats & mango salsa
attributes.description: The bright flavours of sun-drenched Caribbean islands inspired our chefs to create these vegan lettuce bowls. Smoky jerk spice, filling jackfruit and creamy black beans meet juicy mango and sweet tomato.

attributes.title: Harissa kofta, tabbouleh & babaganoush
attributes.description: Rose harissa spiced meatballs served with fresh tabbouleh quinoa salad and smoky babaganoush.
attributes.key_ingredient_description: Middle Eastern spiced grass-fed British beef mince

attributes.title: Wild garlic pesto chicken & carrot mash
attributes.description: Blink and you'll miss wild garlic season: this spring delicacy is gone by May. Delicate and versatile, it is divine in fresh pesto which we spread over free-range Cumbrian chicken. Served with broccoli and carrot mash.

attributes.title: Pesto chicken, sundried tomato & potato salad
attributes.description: Crunchy, salty, tangy – this warm salad, studded with tender free-range British chicken chunks, ticks all the boxes. Hearty Italian taste comes courtesy of creamy basil pesto, sweet sundried tomato, plump olives and zingy pickled onion.

attributes.title: Cauliflower steak with harissa & spiced chickpeas
attributes.description: A chargrilled cauliflower 'steak' coated in harissa, served with crunchy spiced chickpeas and a creamy cauliflower mash. We've poured over a creamy tahini dressing and sprinkled with pistachios.

attributes.title: Salmon jambalaya
attributes.description: It’s not traditional, but it’s tasty all the same – smoky paprika and tomato rice, tossed with onion, peppers and spinach, and flaked with sustainably sourced baked salmon. A squeeze of lemon finishes it off.

attributes.title: Garlic & ginger chicken broth with carrot noodles
attributes.description: Garlic and ginger infused chicken broth served with carrot noodles fresh chilli, shiitake mushroom and spring onion.

attributes.title: Verbena harissa spiced hake with tomato sauce
attributes.description: Our sustainably sourced hake fillets are rubbed in a harissa paste fragranced with lemon verbena and preserved lemon, then cooked with plump dried apricots and carrots. British quinoa soaks up all the gorgeous sauce.

attributes.title: Ribeye of pork & butter bean casserole
attributes.description: This traybake – pairing smoky butter bean casserole with free-range British pork steaks – is hearty enough to warm even the coldest nights. Pan-fried savoy cabbage brings a welcome flash of green, and vitamins K and C.

attributes.title: West Indian spiced fish curry with rice
attributes.description: Tender, sustainably sourced whiting – similar in taste to cod – is the highlight of our West Indian-style curry, fragranced with ginger, spring onion and turmeric, and studded with sweet potato and sugar snaps. Silky coconut milk adds richness.

attributes.title: Prawn, tomato & garlic spaghetti
attributes.description: TBC. ON HOLD ......Rename to "spicy prawn linguine" .

attributes.title: Pork red Thai & peanut curry
attributes.description: This easy curry, served over filling brown rice, is perfect for a cosy weeknight in. We simmer free-range British pork with curry paste, red peppers, ginger and coconut milk, then serve with cavolo nero and peanuts.

attributes.title: Satay chicken skewers with vegetable fried rice
attributes.description: Moreish peanut paste, warm ginger and zingy lime coat our sticky satay skewers, made with tender free-range British chicken and plated with a vitamin-rich vegetable rice. We garnish with a scattering of chilli and spring onions.

attributes.title: Chicken & tomato spaghetti with courgettes
attributes.description: A classic Italian-style tomato sauce, but with added pizzazz! We stir through chunks of free-range chicken breast, fibre-source courgettes, plump black olives and salty capers. To serve, we spoon the lot over red lentil spaghetti.

attributes.title: Pork with colcannon and mustard sauce
attributes.description: Irish mashed potatoes with kale – colcannon – is a delicious way to sneak extra greens into dinner. Here we dish them up with free-range British pork steaks and sweet chantenay carrots cooked in wholegrain mustard sauce.

attributes.title: Apricot & olive tagine with cod & quinoa
attributes.description: Sweet apricots stewed in a north African spiced tagine with aged olives, cod and served with vegetable quinoa

attributes.title: Za'atar roasted butternut & chickpea salad
attributes.description: Herby za’atar and nutty dukkah are two staples of Middle Eastern spicing. And you’ll find both in this squash and chickpea salad, stuffed with grilled veg, herbs and citrus. A rose harissa drizzle is the final touch.

attributes.title: Partridge with lentil dhal & spiced cabbage
attributes.description: A gorgeously wintry dish; sliced red cabbage stews with red wine vinegar and plump raisins, while lentils sizzle with fragrant pasanda spice. Seared slices of partridge breast bring it all together.

attributes.title: Almond coated cod, spicy aubergine & spinach
attributes.description: Our fresh sustainably-sourced cod fillet is coated in a delicious crispy lemon and almond crumb. We roast chunks of aubergine to add smoky flavour and serve with a rich spicy tomato sauce and fresh, wilted spinach.

attributes.title: Shredded chicken, butternut squash, radicchio**
attributes.description: This colourful radicchio and baby cucumber salad packs in an array of fresh, summery flavours. We top it with roasted butternut squash for earthy, nutty accents, shredded pesto free-range chicken and crunchy toasted hazelnuts.

attributes.title: Teriyaki tofu with Tenderstem & carrot noodles
attributes.description: Tofu’s never looked better: here we sizzle it in sticky-sweet teriyaki sauce, then serve over a rainbow bed of carrot, vitamin-rich broccoli and brown rice noodles. The final flourish? Red chilli and black sesame seeds.
